Another worthy mention is 'Born on the Fourth of July' (1989) starring Tom Cruise, which tells the biography of Ron Kovic, a Vietnam war veteran turned anti-war activist.
rec_titles: In the Land of Blood and Honey
Born on the Fourth of July
